page.title: 06YOUTH HOSTEL & CARAVAN SITE
page.content: Osmotherley{Youth Hostel}lies in a glacial over-flow valley (GR 462981) and was once a linen mill. It was modernised 5 years ago and the present wardens, Mr & Mrs Jones have been there for 3 years. They enjoy their work in the country-side because Mr Jones used to work in a factory. They get up at 6.30 am and work until midnight. The hostel has about 6000 visitors a year. There are 11 bedrooms which can accommodate up to 82 people. Half are self catering but everyone helps by washing up and making beds. Most are walkers who stay for 1 or 2 nights. The hostel is closed in Dec. and Jan.Nearby is the{Caravan Site}run by another Mr&Mrs Jones.There are 18 static caravans and room for 57 touring vans,also 20 tents.Toilets and showers are on the site but no shop.It is open from April to October.
